segments.text: I'd like to purchase a pan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there any particular size that you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I cook a lot of big meals .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you think of this one ? It's a 16 " pan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's the right size , but it's so heavy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , look at our aluminum pan . It's much lighter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , this is very light . But the handle is also aluminum .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Look at this one . Same pan , but with a lightweight wooden handle .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . This is exactly what I was looking for . I'll buy it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you'll love this pan . Do you want to pay with cash ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Oh , wait a second , please . What about a lid ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . I forgot to show it to you . Here it is . It comes with the pan .
segments.speaker: S2
